TopicTitle: Fly my plane better than I can

Articles.Content:
I've made this plane and I'm not very good at achieving orbit for max fuel efficiency. Somehow I've made it to Duna orbit though because when I got to earth orbit I still had ~3700 dV left.

I want to land it on Duna in a second version with a kethane converter and drill so I can hopefully send it back to Kerbin. But how about you guys see what you can do with it? Hopefully beat Duna orbit! It flies great, I'm just not good at getting SPs to orbit.

Craft File: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0sz6h0jjf0zxrv9/DDM%202%20SSTO.craft

I used B9 (landing gear), Kosmos (tanks), and Kspx for various other things. Obviously going to need kethane too if you want to do a mission with that!
